ai-tha-ap188:1.1_0: At the end of the night,
ai-tha-ap188:1.2_0: I saw an advantage of youth,
ai-tha-ap188:2.4_0: that leads to a bad place.
ai-tha-ap188:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap188:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bodhi.
ai-tha-ap188:6.1_0: The sixth part of the senior monk Bodhisatta.
